snippet: The American Steven Nyman took advantage of changing conditions for an unlikely win in a shortened World Cup downhill in Val Gardena, Italy, because of heavy snowfall.
abstract: American skier Steven Nyman wins World Cup downhill event in Val Gardena, Italy; other winter sports news noted.
lead_paragraph: The American Steven Nyman took advantage of changing conditions for an unlikely win in a shortened World Cup downhill in Val Gardena, Italy, because of heavy snowfall.

headline.seo: American Skier Steven Nyman Takes Home an Improbable Victory
headline.main: American Skier Takes Home an Improbable Victory
